1.content:
Dr. Kanou was a very sociopathic person as well as a "mad scientist". He was to person who was responsible for Ken Kaneki's tranformation into an artificial One-Eyed Ghoul, and is a member of the mysterious underground ghoul organization Aogiri Tree. Working as their personal "mad scientist" he continues to create more artificial One-Eyed Ghoul as well as other devious innovations. One of those innovations was the project codenamed named "Bodyjacker". Bodyjacker was an artificial One-Eyed Ghoul that Kanou created to be the perfect spy and one of the most powerful ghouls due to his special ability to possess ghoul's bodies. Bodyjacker was a human named Jack. Jack was born into Kanou lab and was raised as a lab rat his whole life. Dr. Kanou created from Bodyjacker's kakuhou a device that will grant its user with Bodyjacker's body possession ability. The device was in the form of a Quinque suitcase. The suitcase was black with a purple design border with the word Jack printed on the side of the suitcase. Dr. Kanou being the "mad scientist" he is sent his newest innovation to ________ to be field tested. Where was the quinque sent to who?


"Jack" Quinque ability:

Dr. Kanou has created a quinque, but this isn't just like any other quinque like the CCG's have been using, but a rather greater class of weapon. Using the RV cells of a ghoul "Bodyjacker" he has created the "Jack" a quinque that gives the user the power of body possession. The user is able to possess anybody human or ghoul. It works by turning into a bowie knife. Upon first look it seems like a any other bowie knife, but the Jack gives the user the ability to teleport anywhere at will and if used to stab somebody will transfer the users mind into the victim's body. The blade will heal the person's body as if it never happened and the users body is ether soul less or on auto pilot.

Which Tokyo Ghoul character would gain the power of body possession?
1.title: Who will be the protagonist?

choices: CCG's Quinx Squad House "Post Time skip"
Kaneki directly "Tokyo Ghoul Root A storyline as Kaneki joined Aogiri"
Kaneki directly in a battle with Eto
11.content: Dr. Kanou wanted to test his innovation and what a better test subject then Ken Kaneki his key creation. Dr. Kanou without the knowlegge of Aogiri Tree has sent the special Quinque as a package to has creation as a way to test his power as well as the Quinque powers. "Haha Ken I hope this power comes in handy, in your quest..." was written on a folded up paper that was taped on the suitcase. Have fun Ken Kaneki, Dr. Kanou said as he had to suitcase delivered to....
11.title: Kaneki's new ability

choices: Akira Mado here to capture Kaneki
111.content:
Kaneki was on hanging out at the coffee shop enjoying some hot freshly made coffee that Touka had made. Siping on his coffee he read todays news in paper. "Ghouls kill 23 in Tokyo's subways" the paper read. Kaneki began to tighten his grip on the paper as he was anger that there are ghouls out there in Aogiri Tree that kill humans for the pure sport of it. "I wish I was more powerful so I can protect the ones I love. Kaneki looked at the black nails and white hair he had revived thanks to Jason, ever since he had gained more powerful and his power got more dangerous after every fight and ghoul eaten, but he feels like he is powerless to even more powerful ghouls like the upper class Aogiri members and wished he possessed a greater power. Just then Kaneki noticed a black and purple suitcase in front of the shop. Kaneki looked around to see if anyone had forgotten it, but picked it up and gone to the back room of the shop. Kaneki looked at the suitcase and found a note taped on the side. It reads

"Dear Kaneki, I have chose you as another one of my test subjects for this quinque. This isn't just like any other quinque like the CCG's have been using, but a rather greater class of weapon. Using the RV cells of a ghoul "Bodyjacker" I have created the Jack a quinque that gives the user the power of body possession. The user is able to possess anybody human or ghoul. It works by turning into a bowie knife. Upon first look it seems like a any other bowie knife, but the Jack gives the ability to teleport anyway at will and if used to stab somebody will transfer the users mind into the victim's body. The blade will heal the person's body as if it never happened and the users body is ether soul less or on auto pilot. Enjoy the power.- Dr. K"

Kaneki want to see if this quinque was legit or not so. Just then someone enter the back room it was......
111.title: Kaneki's gift

choices: Call up Hide and tell him about the knife
Put the knife away and leave to test it somewhere else
1111.content:
"Oh hey what are you doing back Kaneki your shift was ended a while ago" Touka said moving coffee bean bags toward one said of the room. "Oh sorry Touka I've been busy lately getting intel on Aogiri Tree." Kaneki said kicking the suitcase behind him. Touka noticed the sound the suitcase made and asked what this was. "Kaneki what was that you just kicked back?" Touka asked walking towards him. "Oh notting just a bag of coffee that fell?" Kaneki responded hoping to get her attention away from the suitcase. "Whatever just don't kick the the coffee we serve those to our customers" Touka walked out carrying another bag of decaf. Kaneki wondered if this quinque was real or fake. If this was real then he could invade Aogiri tree and learn more about them. He could use this to help protect Touka, Hide, and the rest of his "family". Kaneki picked up the suitcase and tried to active it. Kaneki remember that fight he had with that investigator and tried to do the same. Upon griping the handle the suitcase the suitcase transformed into a bowie knife with black and purple design. Kaneki read on the paper he had to stab someone to get it to work. Looking out the the door he sees Touka closing up in the front. Kaneki wanted to test it.

What does Kaneki do?
1111.title: Touka checking inventory

11111.content: The next question is should Kaneki come from behind and stab Touka or does he tell Touka about the knife and hope that she can help him on the experiment.
11111.title: Test the knife on Touka

111111.content:
Kaneki decides to surprise Touka, and slowly walks up to Touka. Then Kaneki realizes one of the powers said to be able to use within it, teleportation... He decides to teleport right behide Touka. Touka not hearing, or realizing hes right behide her.. Kaneki then plunges the knife into Touka's right liver. The knife is in Kaneki's hand, which allows his mind to be pushed into Touka's body.

Touka's body jolted, as Kaneki's body falls to the floor. Kaneki has possessed Touka, without a problem.

Kaneki was awaken in Touka's body, he looks around and sees his own body on the ground. He says to himself in Touka's voice aloud, "I should put that somewhere until I finish my business..." (I am gonna refer Kaneki as Touka from this point on, until otherwise.)

Touka picks up Kaneki's unconscious body, and puts him in his room, he then leaves the body and goes to Touka's room, and locks the door. He says to himself in her voice, "What am I supposed to do now..."
111111.title: Surprise Touka

1111111.content: Kaneki has never seen a female naked, nor even cared to look at one, until now atleast... He knew that this was a bad idea, but he took the chance while he had it. He choose to strip Toukas body, and have fun with it. He looked at his body nicely, and thought of how neat it was to be inside of someone that he has admired for awhile. He then decided to touch his, or her new boobs... He looked down, and then gave himself a few bounces, and notices that they were very jiggly. This gave him many ideas for the future...
1111111.title: Explore the body?

choices: Dr. Kanou walks in and offers a deal with him
The CCG began to attack the building
Eto shows up again to mess with Jack some more
Someone forgot to close the cell door!
14.content: Jack Mezjiami was an human who was the son of a great CCG investigator from Japan and his mother was an American doctor who met Jack's father in a ghoul raid while being saved from a ghoul. His father and mother were killed by Aogiri Tree and was taken at the age of 13 to doctor Kanou. Dr. Kanou subject him to horrible experiments for 6 long years. Jack strong will prevented him going crazy insane and still plans to break free from Aogiri Tree and Dr. Kanou. At age 18 he has undergone the same procedure Kaneki had and has gain the powers of a ghoul. Jack's procedure was more dangerous due to the fact he has the RV cells of genetically modified ghoul DNA, but he endured and gain special ghoul powers that nobody has seen before. This power was body possession as he was able to turn his whole body into mist and possess any living person by going inside their bodies. Dr. Kanou found out this ability himself as Jack possessed a random human that was used to feed Jack. Upon being possessed the person's eyes changed purple when first being possessed, but then change back to normal. Jack upon discovering this power tried to escape by possessing a ghoul and got as far as making it to the exit, but was defended easily, by Eto and put back into his special cell with a device to prevent him from turning into mist. Two years have passed and Jack has waited and waited for his change to escape. He has a great hatred towards Eto as she would tease him every chance her got. He would remember all those times she would come to his cell and mess with him "Aww Jackie want to leave" she would say as she opened the air tight door to his cell and beat him. "I swear I will have my revenge Eto, and I'll start with you" Jack would say with blood running down he face. "Hahaha your funny, Jackie, you want some of this don't you?" Eto said as she stripped off her top and teased him with her beautiful body. Jack would look on with a mix of hatred and lust as he tried to break the binds he was trapped in. "Haha you like what you see, well too bad you aren't even in my league haha, I don't do one eye virgins like you" Eto said as she walk out and closed to door. "I swear I'll fuck you Eto as soon as I get out of here" Jack said. Two years later Dr. Kanou has created a body possession device and plans to test it in the field to be tested. While in his cell....
14.title: "Bodyjacker"

141.content: Dr. Kanou opens the door to the cell as he walked inside and unlocked Jack's bindings allowing him to stand. "I got a deal for you Bodyjacker" the doctor said as he pulls a sit up nest to him. "You seem to be in great mental state as you haven't gone crazy like the others so I have convince the higher ups in Aogiri Tree to let you out to be a key spy for Aogiri Tree. Of course betrayal will lead you to an early grave as I have installed a safely device inside your body from earlier". Kanou pulled out a remote and pressed it. "Awwwww shitttt" Jack said as he felt a sharp pain shout inside he brain. "Haha just to make sure we are on the same page. I have a deal for you, became my personal spy and infiltrate the enemy base and receive intel. Your powers should prove to make this task very easy. Kanou said opening the cell door. "So what do you say do we have a deal?" Jack looks at the outside of the door, he never seen anything post those four walls in his cell. He wanted revenge on Kanou, Eto, and the rest of Aogiri Tree but it would have to wait, and taking this deal was his only way out of here. "Deal Kanou, what to you need?" Kanou said without looking at Kanou. Kanou pressed the button again sending another shock down Jacks neck. "Neal when you address me Jacker, and call me master!" Jack could't wait to kill Kanou, but he had to play by his rules first. "What is it the you wish my master?" Jack said one one knee. "You will infiltrate.......
141.title: Dr. Kanou's deal

1412.content:
"The higher ups in Aogiri Tree had discovered this coffee shop known as Anteiku. They have found that there were ghouls running the coffee shop" Kanou explained. "So what do you want me to do" you asked. "Well, the higher ranks would like if we could have a spy to see what there deal is, whether there on our side or not" he said. "Sounds easy enough, so when do I get out of this cell" you asked. "Now" he said freeing you and bringing you out of the cell.

"If you have any funny ideas of escaping, I'll have to kill you with this" he said showing you the little button. You let out a small smirk then said "How much time do I have" you asked him. "You have month, if you don't take it back by then, you're done" he said. "Fine" you responded. "That's yes sir to you" he commanded. "Yes sir" you responded quite sarcastically.



When does this take place?
1412.title: Anteiku coffee shop

15.content: Who will receive the Quinque?
15.title: Other characters

info.brief_description: A character from Tokyo Ghoul gains the ability of body possession thanks to a Quinque.
info.description:
Welcome to the grand opening my new possession story, "Tokyo Ghoul The Bodyjacker Archives"! As you might have been aware, this interactive use to be called "Bleach: Ichigo's new power", but I have decided to have change this story into a Tokyo Ghoul possession story and moved all the chapters this story to my "Female Anime/VG Character Possession" story. I have made a chapter pathway for the Bleach possession story and added all of the past chapters there. If you want to view them again and add chapters to that story please follow the link below:

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1580143-Female-AnimeVG-Character-Po...

Plot:

There will be different Tokyo Ghoul characters possessing this power depending on what the writer/reader chooses.

The plot of this story will be made from the beginning of each storyline.

Dr. Kanou has created a quinque, but this isn't just like any other quinque like the CCG's have been using, but a rather greater class of weapon. Using the RV cells of a ghoul "Bodyjacker" he has created the "Jack" a quinque that gives the user the power of body possession. The user is able to possess anybody human or ghoul. It works by turning into a bowie knife. Upon first look it seems like a any other bowie knife, but the Jack gives the user the ability to teleport anywhere at will and if used to stab somebody will transfer the users mind into the victim's body. The blade will heal the person's body as if it never happened and the users body is ether soul less or on auto pilot. This quinque is given to a character and the story begins.

OC Character:

Jack Mezjiami AKA "Bodyjacker"

Jack Mezjiami was an human who was the son of a great CCG investigator from Japan and his mother was an American doctor who met Jack's father in a ghoul raid while being saved from a ghoul. His father and mother were killed by Aogiri Tree and was taken at the age of 13 to doctor Kanou. Dr. Kanou subject him to horrible experiments for 6 long years. Jack strong will prevented him going crazy insane and still plans to break free from Aogiri Tree and Dr. Kanou. At age 18 he has undergone the same procedure Kaneki had and has gain the powers of a ghoul. Jack's procedure was more dangerous due to the fact he has the RV cells of genetically modified ghoul DNA, but he endured and gain special ghoul powers that nobody has seen before. This power was body possession as he was able to turn his whole body into mist and possess any living person by going inside their bodies.


Rules:

Sex is fine

Please write chapters that are at least 7-8 sentences with a plot and good writing.

Please no turning characters gay unless the character from the manga/anime is gay. Yes I know Shū Tsukiyama is up for debate cause of the whole Kaneki thing, but I want the story to not be purely gay possession story in his storyline and others as well.

Have Fun and add chapters!
